description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Kuikui has been procrastinating all year. Winter has arrived, and he needs to fill his stash with nuts! Dig the snow to find them, buy tools to help you and more! Hours of gameplay.
